channel.title: A dam serious topic about letters to jagex
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to my serious topic about jagex
do not flame. This is for letters only. Please read on
I was a long term runescape player (as are many here) but I quit when 503 came
I have realized I have actually done bugger all about getting old rs back so I've come to a solution and I'm gonna need every member of moparscape to help me.
My plan is you write a letter [size=24pt]all about the wilderness, pkin and how many members have been lost [/size]
i will personally mail all the letters you write to jagex themselves
here is my opening letter
An open letter to jagex, funorb and Andrew tower
ever since runescape classic people have loved and enjoyed your game. You then make it super awesome by making it 317 with 3D graphics! You then destroy it all by taking away the wilderness
Attached are (amount) of letters of real runescape players who have quit due to the wilderness. What we all fail to understand Is why did you do it? You now rarely reach above 200,000 players and all because of the wilderness
we as a community beg you to bring back 317! Open up just one runescape 317 server and I can garuntee you will get it packed out! Make your client run both 317 cache and 570+ cache! What do you have to lose except players who were dedicated to your game and pking.
Yours sincerly
bill long time runescape player
Now it's down to you. Yor letter
doesn't have to be detailed must not contain any swearing must abide by the runescape rules (so we actually have a chance) must attempt to tell them that Wildy wildy wildy = Win win win should tell them how much u loved rs 317 should tell them that 317 rocked and you miss it could tell them to mak

@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:9, topic:329343”]Yeah they really care about the opinion of a large cheating community.[/quote]Let our parents work in Jagex.

Read full topic

@system wrote:

They’ll take one good look at the letter, and decide, HEY! This is amazing! It’s so good I’m going to let my recycling bin check it out… FOREVER

Read full topic

item.title: A dam serious topic about letters to jagex
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

If you’ve ever read interviews with them, you’ll know why they removed the wilderness, trade limit, etc… Apparently, W-WIT would have eventually caused them to go bankrupt. I find this hard to believe, but I guess facts are facts.

Read full topic
item.source: A dam serious topic about letters to jagex

This is like epicsuperprodudediebeforeieatyoursoul serious.

item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Dude, RuneScape said them self’s that If they were to change back to the old Wildy, and shit, that they would have to remove, clan wars, stealing creation, revs, change clue scrolls, and lots of other shit.

Not being rude but it’s never going to happen.

[quote=“licorish55, post:3, topic:329343”]Stupid/pointless.

Jagex won’t do anything about it and haven’t for the past 2 years.

Grow up and leave it.[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
